name: Quantum Retribution
description: To become a prisoner in this place you need to commit something really terrible. A kind of disaster, that lead to the deaths of many people. But the problem is that you don't remember anything at all! Are you really guilty? That's the big question!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (x64) Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
